pullRequest.body:
Replaces `BilinForm` with `LinearMap.BilinForm` in support of #10553

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:

- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

nodes.body: @eric-wieser please do you have a moment to review this PR? I'm hoping it's fairly straight-forward. Thanks.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8201212842/job/22429475178)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8201212842/job/22429474339)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8201212842/job/22429474963)
Does L40 have any special effects that aren't a subset of the effects of L41?

If I comment out L40 then line 45 would have to become
```
variable (B : LinearMap.BilinForm R M)
```
However, I can remove L41 without affecting the rest of the file, so I have done that. Thanks.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - refactor(Algebra/Lie/SkewAdjoint): from BilinForm to LinearMap.BilinForm
